description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(930).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,122,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (30 +61*x +30*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -122*x^2 +x^4), - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 05 2013a(n) = 122*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 05 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[930], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 27 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(30 + 61 x + 30 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 122 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 05 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[30, 61, 3690, 7441]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 122*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
